</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 21 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Death Warden Dwarf](/Heritages.aspx?ID=2) heritage

</column>

---

When you critically hit an undead creature, or an undead creature critically fails a saving throw against one of your abilities, you drive your divine wrath home in your enemy’s heart. The undead is [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) 1 for 1 round.
